=============
PrefLib-Tools
=============

.. include:: ../../README.rst
    :start-after: inclusion-marker-badges-begin
    :end-before: inclusion-marker-badges-end

Welcome to the document of the PrefLib-Tools, a set of Python tools developed to work with preference data from the
`PrefLib.org website <https://www.preflib.org/>`_.
